successes.title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero
successes.description: A Belly Dancing Hair-Whipping HD adventure from WayForward: makers of Ducktales Remastered, Adventure Time, & Contra 4!

Pledges.description:
DESKTOP WALLPAPER!
Shantae will grant your every wish whilst lurking behind your icons.
EARLY ADOPTER! Get the game! We'll send you a download code for the platform of your choice... for cheaps!   [includes desktop wallpaper]
GET THE GAME! We'll send you a download code for the platform of your choice. A fine option to be sure, but do read on. More fine choices await your perusal.   [includes desktop wallpaper]
DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK! Ah yes, the OST! This epic soundtrack will include all the game's tunes, plus Kickstarter exclusive Bonus Tracks you won't find anywhere else.   [includes all previous rewards]
DIGITAL ART BOOK! Get sketches, character bios, concepts, and more in a book made of pure energy.   [includes all previous rewards]
EARLY ACCESS! Download the Beta Version to your Windows PC and give it a spin before anyone else! [includes all previous rewards]

TINKERBAT TRANSFORMATION! Shantae dances to transform into various creatures, but none so rare as the Tinkerbat! This special playable character will be made available only to Kickstarter Backers, accessible via an UNLOCK CODE. [includes all previous rewards]
CONTRIBUTOR: Your name in the Credits! You'll also get to vote on transformations, magical moves, & boss designs. Help shape the game! [includes all previous rewards]

STANDARD EDITION: This tier adds a physical MUSIC CD containing the full OST & bonus tracks, plus exclusive CD cover artwork and an additional song found only on this CD! [includes all previous rewards]

COLLECTOR'S EDITION: Comes with a COMMEMORATIVE METAL COIN featuring Shantae on one side, and her arch nemesis Risky Boots on the other. Now you can make life's most important decisions by tossing this "naughty or nice" doubloon, exclusive to Backers.  [includes all previous rewards]

GROOVIN' SHANTAE T-SHIRT! Add a cool T-Shirt to the previous rewards packages. Why not? You were going to buy clothes anyway. We offer both standard T's and girly cut T's in a variety of sizes. Featuring a design that's exclusive to Backers.  [includes all previous rewards]
LENTICULAR WALL POSTER: If you love animation as much as we do, don't miss this incredible 3D-motion poster featuring Shantae's famous dance moves.   [includes all previous rewards]

PLATINUM EDITION! Our largest bundle includes a HARD COVER ART BOOK + FLIPBOOK! The digital art book manifested in physical form -- with even more extras: never-before-seen Shantae roughs, and animation frames right in the margins so you can Flip the pages like a Champ! [includes all previous rewards]

YOUR ART IN GAME! Become a Featured Artist in the Sequin Land Art Museum (an actual place in the game). Your Shantae inspired fan-art will adorn the walls! "Featured Artist" credit included.  [includes all Platinum Edition rewards]
Get a sketch of any Shantae character from series creator Matt Bozon! Now you can finally have that drawing of Hipster Rottytops you've always wanted. [includes all Platinum Edition rewards]

ENEMY DESIGNER: Create the overall look and behavior of a Sequin Land Monster! You describe it and weâ€™ll draw it up, animate it, and code it based on your idea! "Enemy Designer" credit included. [includes all Platinum Edition rewards]

YOUR FACE IN GAME: This is the big one! Send us a photo, and we'll design a Scuttle Town NPC in your image! Wait till you show Mom how you spent that hard-earned money! Guaranteed she'll beam with... emotion. "Guest Star" credit included. [includes all Platinum Edition rewards]

WRAP PARTY INVITATION! Join us at WayForward HQ in Valencia, California. Grub it up, boogie down, and test drive the final game with us! Travel and accommodations not provided. [includes all Platinum Edition rewards]

ORIGINAL SHANTAE + WRAP PARTY: When you arrive at WayForward HQ, you'll receive the ultra-rare granddaddy of video game collectables: a FACTORY SEALED SHANTAE for the Game Boy Color! Yes, we recently unearthed 3 of these when moving to our new location. You'll get one -- along with the option of having it signed by the original team. Travel and accommodations not provided. [ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED!]
